events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate and initial review looks promising.
The application has been categorized under Engineering department based on the candidateâ€™s experience and skillset in software development.
Recruiter assigned to the candidate for the Software Engineer role and will be contacting them shortly for the initial screening.
Completed initial screening call with the candidate; they showed strong knowledge in software architecture and programming languages.
Candidate has responded positively to scheduling the technical interview and confirmed availability for next week.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 12th at 10:00 AM with the senior engineering panel.
Candidate completed the technical interview and demonstrated excellent problem-solving skills and system design understanding.
HR interview scheduled for May 15th to discuss compensation, benefits, and company culture with the candidate.
HR interview went well with the candidate showing great enthusiasm for the role and alignment with company values.
An official offer has been proposed to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits package.
Candidate has provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
Candidate officially accepted the offer and confirmed the start date for onboarding next month.
Onboarding process has started successfully with the new software engineer completing all necessary documentation.
Hiring process concluded successfully with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering team and productive at work.
